{{ $package := or (.Get "package") "frequency-plans" }}{{ $frequency_plan := .Get "frequency-plan" -}} {{ $data := index .Site.Data $package}} {{- if $frequency_plan -}} {{- with index $data $frequency_plan -}} {{- partial "frequency-plan.html" . -}} {{- else }} {{ errorf "frequency plan %s of package %s not found" $frequency_plan $package }} {{- end }} {{- else -}} {{- range $data -}} {{- partial "frequency-plan.html" . -}} {{- else -}} {{ errorf "package %s not found" $package }} {{- end -}} {{- end -}}
